request.description:
Debug endpoint to inspect the vectors and chunks in a configuration.

Args:
    configuration_name: Name of the configuration to inspect
    limit: Maximum number of chunks to return
    show_vectors: Whether to include embedding vectors in the response
    
Returns:
    Dictionary containing chunks and their metadata from the configuration

response.name: Validation Error

body.raw:
{
  "query": "What is Computer Vision?",
  "configuration_names": ["batch_ml_ai_basics_test", "batch_rl-docs_test"],
  "fusion_method": "rrf",
  "k": 10,
  "include_metadata": false,
  "similarity_threshold": 0.2,
  "use_reranking": true,
  "include_vectors": false
}

request.description:
Retrieve relevant documents from a configuration without generating a response.

This endpoint allows direct access to the vector retrieval functionality without LLM generation.
It's useful for debugging, testing, or when only the context documents are needed.

Args:
    request: The retrieval request containing query and options

Returns:
    Documents retrieved from the vector store, optionally reranked

response.name: Successful Response
Validation Error

body.raw:
{
  "query": "What is Computer Vision?",
  "configuration_name": "batch_ml_ai_bm25_test",
  "include_metadata": false,
  "similarity_threshold": 0.2,
  "k": 5,
  "use_reranking": true,
  "include_vectors": true
}

request.description:
List all unique documents in a configuration.

Args:
    configuration_name: The configuration to list documents from
    
Returns:
    List of unique document IDs and their metadata

response.name: Validation Error

request.description:
Retrieve all chunks of a specific document.

Args:
    document_id: The ID of the document to retrieve chunks for
    configuration_name: The configuration where the document is stored
    
Returns:
    Dictionary containing all chunks of the document

response.name: Validation Error

request.description:
Delete all chunks of a specific document.

Args:
    document_id: The ID of the document to delete chunks for
    configuration_name: The configuration where the document is stored
    
Returns:
    Dictionary with deletion results

response.name: Validation Error

request.description:
Delete all documents and their chunks from a configuration.

Args:
    configuration_name: The configuration to delete documents from
    confirm: Must be set to true to confirm the deletion
    
Returns:
    Results of the deletion operation

response.name: Validation Error

request.description:
Get detailed information about available chunking strategies.

This endpoint provides comprehensive documentation about the different text chunking
strategies available in the system, including their parameters, use cases, and examples.

Get detailed information about available embedding models.

This endpoint provides comprehensive documentation about the different embedding
models available in the system, including their parameters, use cases, and examples.

Get detailed information about available vector store options.

This endpoint provides comprehensive documentation about the different vector
store options available in the system, including their parameters, use cases, and examples.

Get detailed information about available reranking models.

This endpoint provides comprehensive documentation about the different reranking
models available in the system, including their parameters, use cases, and examples.

Get detailed information about MCP (Model Control Plane) integration.

This endpoint provides comprehensive documentation about the MCP integration
in the RAG service, including configuration options, API endpoints, and usage examples.
